product_name: Patagonia Minimalist Wavefarer Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Minimalist Wavefarer board shorts are a shorter, trimmer version of the classic Wavefarer; they're made of quick-drying Supplex(R) nylon with a touch of stretch for great mobility. Stretch-woven nylon allows good mobility while you're swimming and surfing; Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Forward inseam at the crotch eliminates chafing; flat-lying, single-button fly and a contoured waistband with a drawstring closure ensure a comfortable fit. Patagonia Minimalist Wavefarer board shorts have a self-draining zippered pocket on right side that secures small essentials; plastic zipper pull won't corrode. Pocket includes an internal key clip. Regular fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Minimalist Wavefarer board shorts are a shorter, trimmer version of the classic Wavefarer; they're made of quick-drying Supplex(R) nylon with a touch of stretch for great mobility.
